SEARCH
Package org.spaceinvaders.classes

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
org.spaceinvaders.classes.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGameObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Coin, Dummy, Enemy, Player, Projectile, ShopButton
public abstract class Entity extends Object implements IGameObject
Entity class represents object in game. Abstract class that provides basic functionality for game entities, such as position, velocity, rendering, and collision detection
